participant_1.name: Samantha
participant_1.personality: Energetic and sociable, loves to have a good time and meet new people.
participant_1.background: My favorite movie is Mean Girls. I own a cat and a dog. I am deathly afraid of heights. I help out at the food bank occasionally. I am a party animal.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Inspiring and determined, focused on personal growth and helping others achieve their goals.
participant_2.background: I'm a cancer survivor. My parents were both very athletic. I got a new job just yesterday to be a life coach. I am a clean eater. I love running and preparing for marathons.

content.text: Not bad. Excited to start my new job!
